name: DezDobramentos #0003
description:
Essa peça 1/1 foi feita especialmente para @SABATOBOX por ser o primeiro colecionador da série DezDobramentos, tendo coletado o trabalho DezDobramentos #0002 em 27/10/2021.


Nada é uma coisa só.

O que divide também se multiplica. Fragmentos que formam o todo.

Às vezes, depende apenas de quão próximos estamos.


english below ... 


This 1/1 piece was made especially for @SABATOBOX for being the first collector of the DezDobramentos series, having collected the work DezDobramentos #0002 on 10/27/2021.


Nothing is one thing.

What divides also multiplies. Fragmented beings that form the whole.

Sometimes it just depends on how close we are.


JPG | 6000 x 4000 px | 300 DPI

www.mateusmorbeck.com | contato@mateusmorbeck.com

About the artist: Mateus Morbeck is a Brazilian visual artist and architect. He seeks to reflect on the causes and consequences of human actions. His procedural and methodological search is structured from the use of technologies, old and current, mapping, cataloging and restructuring traces of the trail left by human beings, based on the belief of domination over nature. From a systemic perspective, his work ranges from punctual elements to events with a global impact. The visual complexity generated by the profusion of layers, images and meaning, is directly related to the complexity of understanding the issues involved. Nothing is one thing.
